name: getDirectDebitByUuid
description:
Retrieve all details of a single direct debit collection/payment, whether successful or not.
The permision needed to access this endpoint is **PERM_BUSINESS_GET_DIRECT_DEBIT**

directDebitUuid.description: The uuid of the direct debit to retrieve.

$ul: **code**: The three letter code for the currency - either `EUR` or `GBP`.
**dateCreated**: Date the direct debit was created. Milliseconds since the epoch (1970).
**directDebitUuid**: The UUID for the direct debit payment
**isDDIC**: DDIC is a Direct Debit Indemnity Claim (i.e.a refund). If if the DD is requested to be refunded it is marked isDDIC true.
**lastUpdated**: Date the direct debit was last updated. Milliseconds since the epoch (1970).
**originatorAlias**: The Alias of the party who sets up the direct debit.
**originatorName**: The creator of the party who sets up the direct debit.
**originatorReference**: Set by party who sets up the direct debit.
**schemeRejectReasonCode**: The reject code returned by the bank indicating an issue with the direct debit. Each ARRUD code represents a rejection reason.
**status**: The statuses of the direct debit payments associated with the mandate.
**targetIcan**: The ican of your fire account that the money was taken from
**targetPayeeId**: The payee that was created when the DD was processed
**type**: The type of the direct debit.
